bibl.title: Papyrus and Preservation.
bibl.note: Presentation of the project called Advanced Papyrological Information System (APIS), intended to provide an integrated system to support research and teaching in papyrology.
bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S., Papyrus and Preservation.
Computing in the Classics = CW 91 (1997-1998) pp. 543-552.
Presentation of the project called Advanced Papyrological Information System (APIS), intended to provide an integrated system to support research and teaching in papyrology.
